note.snippet: Vida – anubhavane, sukhaṃ vedeti, vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti
Vida – ārocane, vedayāmahaṃ bhante vedayatīti maṃ dhāretu
‘‘Abbhatītā ca ye buddhā, vattamānā anāgatā’’ti ca
Paṭhama, majjhimu’ttamapurisā purisabhedo. ‘Puriso’ti ca ‘‘yaṃkiñcāyaṃ purisapuggalo paṭisaṃvedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā’’ti
ettha attā eva vuccati, so ca attā ‘‘so karoti, so paṭisaṃvedetī’’ti
anti si tha mi ma te ante se vhe e mhe
Atrimā pāḷī – tuvañca putto suṇisā ca nattā, sammodamānā gharamāvasetha
. Ahañca putto suṇisā ca nattā, sammodamānā gharamāvasema
Ahañca dāni āyasmā ca sāriputto bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāma
Ettha ca suttavibhāgena ‘‘sabbaṃ hidaṃ bhañjare kālapariyāyaṃ
, atikkamiyyati, samatikkamiyyati, vītivattiyyati, nimittaṃ abhibhuyyatīti gotrabhu
– idhāyaṃ pabbato tiṭṭhati, candimasūriyā pariyāyanti, disā bhanti virocamānā
– api nu te gahapati kule dānaṃ dīyatīti, dīyati me bhante kule dānaṃ
– na khādati ayaṃ maṃsaṃ, neva pāṇaṃ hanati
Suttavibhattena tadāyoge atītepi ayaṃ vibhatti hoti, vākacīrāni dhunanto, gacchāmi ambare tadā
Yāva, pure, purāyoge anāgatepi-idheva tāva tiṭṭhāhi, yāvāhaṃ āgacchāmi, yaṃnūnāhaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyaṃ
Ekaṃsatthepi-nirayaṃ nūnagacchāmi, ettha me natthi saṃsayo
Aniyamatthepi-manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā
Tu antu hi tha mi ma taṃ antaṃ su vho e āmase
Pañhe-dhammaṃ vā tvaṃ adhiyassu vinayaṃ vā
Anumatiyaṃ-paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohi
Anuññāyaṃ-puccha vāsava maṃ pañhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi
, musā me bhaṇamānāya, muddhā phalatu sattadhā
Nimantane-adhivāsetu me bhante bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṃ
, punārāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisa
Pattakāle-parinibbātu bhante bhagavā, parinibbātu sugato, parinibbānakālo bhante bhagavato
, kālo kho te mahāvīra, uppajja mātukucchiyaṃ
, byākarohi aggivessana na dāni te tuṇhībhāvassa kālo
Hetuphalesveyya eyyuṃ eyyāsi eyyātha eyyāmi eyyāma etha eraṃ etho eyyāvho

note.original: ka. 416; rū. 454; nī. 881-4; caṃ. 1.3.128; pā. 3.3.169-172; satyarahesveyyādī (bahūsu)

note.snippet: Atrimā pāḷī-caje mattā sukhaṃ dhīro, passe ce vipulaṃ sukhaṃ
, dhīraṃ passe suṇe dhīraṃ, dhīrena saha saṃvase
Atrimā pāḷī-vajjuṃ vā te na vā vajjuṃ, natthi nāsāya rūhanā
, upayānāni me dajjuṃ, rājaputta tayī gateti
, gantvāna taṃ paṭikaremu accayaṃ, appeva naṃ putta labhemu jīvitaṃ
Mahāvuttinā kvaci majjhe yyā-kārassa lopo, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchesi
Parivīmaṃsāyaṃ-gaccheyyaṃ vā ahaṃ uposathaṃ, na vāgaccheyyaṃ
bhante bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadaṃ
Anumatiyaṃ-taṃ jano hareyya vā daheyya vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā kareyya
Āmantane-yadā te pahiṇeyyāmi, tadā eyyāsi khattiya
Kriyātipanne-sace so agāraṃ ajjhāvaseyya, rājā assa cakkavattī
Anajjattane ā ū o ttha a mhā ttha tthuṃ se vhaṃ iṃ mhase
ī ū mhā ssā ssāmhānaṃ vā
Ettha ca mahāvuttinā ā-vibhattiyā thādeso bahulaṃ dissati, medanī sampakampatha
Bhūte ī uṃ o ttha iṃ mhā ā ū se vhaṃ aṃ mhe

note.original: ka. 516; rū. 466; nī. 1030; caṃ. 1.2.76; pā. 3.2.110 aīssaādīnaṃ byañjanassiu (bahūsu)

note.snippet: Eyyāthasseaāīthānaṃ o a aṃ ttha ttho vho vā
Atrimā pāḷī – īmhi-paṅko ca mā visiyittho
Atrimā pāḷī-ossa atte-mā hevaṃ ānanda avaca
, tvameva dāni’makara, yaṃ kāmo byagamā tayi
. Itte-mā tvaṃ bhāyi mahārāja, mā tvaṃ bhāyi rathesabha
, mā cintesi mā tvaṃ soci, yācāmi luddakaṃ ahaṃ
, mā tvaṃ maññittho na maṃ jānātī
Suttavibhattena tthassa ttho hoti, taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddante, yāvantettha samāgatā
, massu mittānaṃ dubbhittho. Mittadubbho hi pāpakoti
Mahāvuttinā ossa kvaci lopo, puna dānaṃ adā tuvaṃ
Imiccassa mhā, tthānañca ādimhi suu hoti, sāgamo hotīti attho. Casaddena īādīnampi ādimhi sāgamo hoti, sāgame ca sati byañjanaṃ hoti, tassa ādimhi iāgamo labbhati. Tena ‘‘imā gāthā abhāsisuṃ
Suttavibhattena ādantatopi ca, vihāsuṃ viharanti ca
Parokkhe a u e tha aṃ mha ttha re ttho vho iṃ mhe
Bhavissati ssati ssanti ssasi ssatha ssāmi ssāma ssate ssante ssase ssavhe ssaṃ ssāmhe
Tattha garahāyaṃ-atthi nāma tāta sudinna ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjissasi
hi nāma saññī samāno pañcamattānaṃ sakaṭasatānaṃ saddaṃ na sossati
Anutthunanādīsu-na attanā paṭicodessaṃ, na gaṇassa ārocessaṃ
, bhūtānaṃ nāpacāyissaṃ, pahu santo na posissaṃ, paradāraṃ asevissaṃ
Katthaci pana gāthāvasena ekasakāralopo, mitto mittassa pāniyaṃ, adinnaṃ paribhuñjisaṃ

note.original: ka. 422; rū. 475; nī. 895; caṃ. 1.3.107; pā. 3.3.139; eyyādo vātipattiyaṃ (bahūsu)
note.snippet: Eyyādotipattiyaṃ ssā ssaṃsu sse ssatha ssaṃ ssāmhā ssatha ssiṃsu ssase ssavhe ssiṃ ssāmhase

note.original: ‘sace pana nikkhamitvā pabbajissa, arahattaṃ pāpuṇissa’ (dhammapada aṭṭha. 1)
note.snippet: Tattha atītāyaṃ-sace so paṭhamavaye pabbajjaṃ alabhissā, arahā abhavissā
Tyādyuppatti, kattarilo, mahāvuttinā sare pare ādantamhā kvaci yāgamo, akkhāti. Parassaralopo, akkhāyati, kriyaṃ ākhyāti, ākhyāyati, jātiṃ akkhāhi pucchito
Kamme-ñāpīyati, ñāpīyanti, ṭhāti, ṭhānti, opupphā padmā ṭhānti, mālāva ganthitā ṭhānti, dhajaggāneva dissare
‘Uṃssiṃsvaṃsū’ti uṃssa iṃsu, aṃsu, adhiṭṭhahiṃsu, saṇṭhahiṃsu, upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Atthamentamhi sūriye, vāḷā panthe upaṭṭhahuṃ
Ssatyādimhi-ṭhassati, ṭhassanti, rassattaṃ, upaṭṭhissati, upaṭṭhissanti, ahaṃ bhotiṃ upaṭṭhissaṃ
Thā-ṭhāne, avatthāti, avatthāyati, vitthāyati, vitthāyanti, mā kho vitthāsi
‘Iyaṅa’ iti suttavibhattena aññadhātūnampi. Jā-hāniyaṃ, appena bahuṃ jiyyāma
Ādiyati, ādiyanti, upādiyati, upādiyanti, samādiyati, samādiyanti, sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyāmi
Gama vada dānaṃ ghamma vajja dajjā
Ajjhattanimhi-adadi, adāsi, adaduṃ, adaṃsu, adajji, adajjuṃ, tvaṃ adado. Varañce me ado sakka
Parachakke-so dānaṃ adā, brāhmaṇassa adā dānaṃ, sivīnaṃ raṭṭhavaḍḍhano
Dāiccassa diccha, pavecchādesampi icchanti, vipulaṃ annaṃ pānañca, samaṇānaṃ pavecchasi
Kamme-sandhīyati, sandhīyanti, sandhiyyati, sandhiyyanti, vidhiyyati. Navena sukhadukkhena, porāṇaṃ apidhiyyati
pāḷī-ayañhi te mayā’ruḷho, saro pissati lohitaṃ
. Naḷena vāriṃ pissāma, na ca maṃ tvaṃ vadhissasi
, paṭibhāti, paṭibhanti, paṭibhātu, paṭibhantu taṃ cunda bojjhaṅgā
Mā-māne, dvittaṃ rasso ca, mamāyati, mamāyanti. Yemaṃ kāyaṃ mamāyanti, andhā bālā puthujjanā
Yā-gatiyaṃ, yāti, yanti, yāyati, yāyanti, yāyanta’ manuyāyanti
Kattu, kammani kyo, īuāgamo, hiyyoti hiyyati poso
pāḷi, hāhiti, hāhinti, hāhati, hāhanti, jahissati, hissati, aññamaññaṃ vadhitvāna, khippaṃ hissāma jīvitaṃ
Etu, sametu, entu, samentu, ehi, samehi, etha, sametha, etha byagghā nivattavho, paccupetha mahāvanaṃ
Mahāvuttinā idhātumhā eyyādīnaṃ ekārassa lopo, na ca apatvā dukkhassantaṃ
, vissāsaṃ eyya paṇḍito, yadā te pahiṇeyyāmi, tadā eyyāsi khattiya
Khito yāgamo, vikappena yassa dvittaṃ, kappo khīyetha, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassa
, avaṇṇaṃ pakāsentīti attho. Khiyyati, khiyyanti, āyu khiyyati maccānaṃ, kunnadīnaṃva odakaṃ
Kamme kyamhi dīgho, na taṃ jitaṃ sādhu jitaṃ, yaṃ jitaṃ avajīyati. Taṃ kho jitaṃ sādhu jitaṃ, yaṃ jitaṃ nāvajīyati
Ṇāpimhi pubbassaralopo vā, jāpeti, jāpayati. Yo na hanti na ghāteti, na jināti na jāpaye
Bhī-bhaye, bheti. Mā bhetha kiṃ socatha modathavho
, vibhemi etaṃ asādhuṃ, uggatejo hi brāhmaṇo
Kārite mahāvuttinā sāgamo vā, bhīseti, bhīsayati, bhīsāpeti, bhīsāpayati. Bhikkhuṃ bhīseyya vā bhīsāpeyya vā
, umheti, umhayati, vimheti, vimhayati, na naṃ umhayate disvā, na ca naṃ paṭinandati
Kārite pubbassaralopo, sace maṃ nāganāsūrū, umhāyeyya pabhāvatī. Sace maṃ nāganāsūrū, pamhāyeyya pabhāvatī
Atrimā pāḷī-nibbānaṃ bhagavā āha, sabbaganthapamocanaṃ, āha tesañca yo nirodho
, yaṃ pare sukhato āhu, tadariyā āhu dukkhato. Yaṃ pare dukkhato āhu, tadariyā sukhato vidū
Te āhaṃsu, saccaṃ kirevamāhaṃsu, narā ekacciyā idha
Āādimhi-so ahuvā. Vaṇṇagandhaphalūpeto, amboyaṃ ahuvā pure
, te ahuvū, tvaṃ ahuvo, tumhe ahuvattha
, jhāyatha bhikkhave mā pamādāttha, mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha, ahuva, ahuvaṃ vā, ahuvamhā. ‘‘Akaramhasa te kiccaṃ, yaṃ balaṃ ahuvamhase
Mahāvuttinā īlopo rasso ca. Ahudeva bhayaṃ ahu chambhitattaṃ. Ahudeva kukkuccaṃ, ahu vippaṭisāro
Atrimā pāḷī- sabbamhi taṃ araññamhi, yāvantettha dijā ahuṃ
Mahāvuttinā olopo rasso, mā bhoti kupitā ahu
, ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānaṃ, na nu kho ahosiṃ, kinnu kho ahosiṃ, kathaṃ nu kho ahosiṃ
, ahaṃ ahuviṃ, mayaṃ ahosimhā, ahosimha vā. Ahesumhā nu kho mayaṃ atītamaddhānaṃ, na nu kho ahesumhā, kinnu kho ahesumhā, kathaṃ nu kho ahesumhā
. Mayaṃ pubbe ahuvimhā, ahumhā vā. ‘‘Mayaṃ pubbe dānapatino ahumhā’’ti
, hessanti, hehissati, hehissanti, hohissati, hohissanti. Buddho hessaṃ sadevake
Atrimā pāḷī-piyo ca me hehiti mālabhārī, ahañca naṃ mālinī ajjhupessaṃ
. Tato sukhī hohisi vītarāgo. Khippaṃ hohisi anāsavo
Mahāvuttinā edantānaṃ tyādīsu tabbādīsu ca āyādeso, kvaci yalopo, e-āgatiyaṃ. Ayaṃ so sārathī eti
Bhe-bhaye, bhāyati, bhāyanti, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno
, kinnu kho ahaṃ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi
Bhikkhu attanā vippakataṃ kuṭiṃ parehi pariyosāpeti
Disī-uddisane, uddisanaṃ sarūpato kathanaṃ. Uddisati, pātimokkhaṃ uddisanti
Phusa-samphasse pattiyañca, phusati, phusanti dhīrā nibbānaṃ
Yamhi dhassa jhattaṃ, yassa pubbarūpaṃ. ‘Catutthadutiyesvesaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā’ti jhassa tatiyajattaṃ, vajjhati, vajjhanti, vajjhare. Ime sattā haññantu vā vajjhantu vā
Ettha ca ‘‘atthi tvaṃ etarahi, na tvaṃ natthi, atthi ahaṃ etarahi, nāhaṃ natthi, puttā matthi dhanā matthi
‘‘Atthīti kho kaccāyana ayameko anto, natthīti dutiyo anto’’ti
. Himhi dīgho, tvaṃ paṇḍito āhi, bhavāhīti attho. Tavibhattīsu dhātvantassa pararūpaṃ, tumhe attha, kaccittha parisuddhā

note.original: ka. 571, 517; rū. 624, 488; nī. 830, 1105; ‘atthiteyyādicchannaṃ sasusasatha saṃ sāma’ (bahūsu)
note.snippet: Atthiteyyādichannaṃ sa su sasi satha saṃsāma
Assunipātopi bahuṃ dissati, tayassu dhammā jahitā bhavanti
, kenassu taratī oghaṃ, kenassu tarati aṇṇavaṃ
. ‘‘Kiṃsu chetvā sukhaṃ seti, kiṃsu chetvā na socatī’’ti
siyā, te siyuṃ, ete dve nipātāpi honti. ‘‘Vedanākkhandho siyā kusalo, siyā akusalo, siyā abyākato’’ti
‘‘Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā’’ti
Mahāvuttinā eyyuṃ, eyyamiccetesaṃ iyaṃsu, iyaṃ honti, ādilopo, siyaṃsu dve bhikkhū abhidhamme nānāvādā
, evaṃrūpo siyaṃ ahaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, evaṃvedano siyaṃ, evaṃsañño siyaṃ
So āsi, te āsuṃ, āsiṃsu, tvaṃ āsi, tumhe āsittha, ahaṃ āsiṃ. Tatrāpāsiṃ evaṃvaṇṇo
Kamu-vijjhane, gambhīresu ṭhānesu ñāṇaṃ kamati, na satthaṃ kamati, na visaṃ kamati, na aggi kamati
Īādimhi mahāvuttinā ādidīgho vā hoti, so pakkami, pakkāmi, idaṃ vatvāna pakkāmi, maddī sabbaṅgasobhaṇā
, pakkamuṃ, pakkāmuṃ, sammodamānā pakkāmuṃ, aññamaññaṃ piyaṃ vadā
Atipubbo upādhipubbo ca titikkame, nakkhattaṃ paṭimānentaṃ, attho bālaṃ upajjhagā
Etāni o, avacanānaṃ lope sati tumha’mhayogepi labhanti, aguṃ, agiṃsu, agaṃsu. Samantā vijjutā āguṃ
. Ajjhago, ajjhaga, ajjhagi, ajjhaguttha, ajjhagiṃ, ajjhagimhā, ajjhagumhā, agā, āgā, anvagā, ajjhagā, upajjhagā, agū, āgū. Āgū devā yasassino
. Cetā haniṃsu vedabbaṃ, sabbe te byasanamajjhagū
ādissa dvittaṃ, ‘kavaggahānaṃ cavaggajā’ti pubbassa cavaggo. So jagama, mahāvuttinā upantassa dīgho, kvaci assa ittaṃ, ‘‘rājā dudīpo jagāmi magga’’nti
Mahāvuttinā gagghādeso vā, tvaṃ yena yeneva gagghasi, phāsuṃyeva gagghasi
Labha vasa chida gama bhida rudānaṃ cchaṅa
saha etesaṃ cchaṅa hoti vā ssayuttāsu vibhattīsu, suttavibhattena susassa ca, ‘‘nadīva avasucchatī’’ti
Atrimā pāḷī-gacchaṃ pāraṃ samuddassa, kassaṃ purisakāriyaṃ
, tassāhaṃ santikaṃ gacchaṃ, so me satthā bhavissati, sabbāni abhisambhossaṃ, gacchaññeva rathesabha
Vipassanā, vipassī bhagavā, sudassī, piyadassī, atthadassī, dhammadassī, sudassaṃ vajjamaññesaṃ
kamme sijjhanti, divādigaṇe kattari sijjhanti. Mahāvuttinā addassa, dissādesāpi honti. Atrimā pāḷī-yaṃ vāsavaṃ addassāmaṃ
, mayi ime dhammā sandissanti, ahañca imesu dhammesu sandissāmi
Eyyāmassa emu ca antassa u ca honti. ‘‘Kattha passemu khattiyaṃ
Dasa, dādesesu dakārassa dvittaṃ, addasā kho bhagavā

note.original: jātake ‘‘āmantayassu te putte, mā te mātara maddasuṃ’’
note.snippet: . Te addasū. Rassatte-addasu, āmantayassu vo putte, mā te mātaramaddasu
Rassatte-adda. Yāyamāno mahārājā, addā sīdantare nage
. Yo dukkhaṃ sukhato adda, dukkhamaddakkhi sallato
, addasū, ahaṃ addasaṃ, mayaṃ addassimhe. Addasaṃ kāma te mūlaṃ, saṅkappā kāma jāyasi
Kvaci sāgame ākārāgamo, so addasāsi, te addasāsuṃ, ahaṃ addasāsiṃ, mayaṃ adasāsimha. Yaṃ addasāsiṃ sambuddhaṃ, desentaṃ dhammamuttamaṃ
Mahāvuttinā iṃssa imhi hoti, pathe addasāsimhi bhojaputte
‘Jaramarānamiyaṅa’iti iyādeso, miyati, miyanti, amhaṃ daharā na miyyare
Ssatyādimhi-‘labhavasachidagamabhidānaṃ cchaṅa’iti ssena saha dassa cchādeso, sā nūna kapaṇā ammā, cirarattāya rucchati
. Sā nūna kapaṇā ammā, ciraṃ rucchati assame
, kaṃ nva’jja chātā tasitā, uparucchanti dārakā
Mahāvuttinā uṃssa thuṃ, thaṃsu honti, mhāssa ca thamhā, thuṃmhā honti, te bhagavato santike pabbajjañca upasampadañca alatthuṃ
, satiṃ paccalatthuṃ, viparītasaññaṃ paccalatthuṃ, te satiṃ paccalatthaṃsu, agamamhā kho tava gehaṃ, tattha neva dānaṃ alatthamhā
, akkosameva alatthamhā, mayañca alatthamhā savanāya, alatthumhā vā. Dhātvantassa ccho ca. Tadāhaṃ pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ, paṭilacchiṃ ayoniso

Ssatyādimhi-‘labhavasa chida gama bhida rudānaṃ cchaṅa’iti suttena ssena saha dhātvantassa cchādeso, lacchati, labhissati, lacchanti, labhissanti, lacchasi, labhissasi, lacchatha, labhissatha, lacchāmi, labhissāmi, lacchāma, labhissāma. Lacchāma putte jīvantā, arogā ca bhavāmase
So avoci, te avocuṃ, avociṃsu, tvaṃ avoci, tumhe avocuttha, ahaṃ avociṃ, mayaṃ avocumhā, so avoca, rasso, bhagavā etadavoca

note.original: ka. 481; rū. 524; nī. 963; ‘bhuja muca vaca visānaṃ kkhaṅa (bahūsu)

note.snippet: Atrimā pāḷī-vajjuṃ vā te na vā vajjuṃ, natthi nāsāya rūhanā
, ammaṃ ārogyaṃ vajjāsi, tvañca tāta sukhī bhava
, ammaṃ ārogyaṃ vajjātha, ayaṃ no neti brāhmaṇo
Kārite-nivedeti, paṭivedeti, nivedayati, paṭivedayati, paṭivedayāmi vo bhikkhave
, jānāpemīti attho. Vedayāmahaṃ bhante, vedayatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretūti
‘Assū’ti suttena akārassa uttaṃ, vussati, vussanti, vussare, ‘‘bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī’’ti
Ssatyādīsu-‘labha vasa chida gama bhida rudānaṃ cchaṅa’iti ssena saha dhātvantassa cchādeso, vacchati, vasissati, vacchanti, vasissanti, āyasmato nissāya vacchāmi
Mahāvuttinā dhātvantassa kkho hoti, pāvekkhi pathaviṃ cecco
Ssatyādīsu ‘vaca bhuja muca visānaṃ kkhaṅa’iti ssena saha dhātvantassa kkho, pavekkhati, pavisissati, pavekkhanti, pavisissanti, esa bhiyyo pavekkhāmi, vammikaṃ sataporisaṃ
Sada-saṃsīdane, ‘jarasadānamīma vā’tiādisaramhā īmaāgamo hoti vā, sīdati, sīdanti, lābūni sīdanti, silā plavanti
‘Kvaci vikaraṇāna’nti suttena lavikaraṇassa lope hanti, phalaṃ ve kadaliṃ hanti, sakkāro kāpurisaṃ hanti
Mahāvuttinā kvaci dhātvantalopo, vikkosamānā tibbāhi, hanti nesaṃ varaṃ varaṃ
Īādimhi-so ahāsi, ajini maṃ ahāsi me
, attānaṃ upasaṃhāsi, āsanaṃ abhihāsi, sāsane vihāsi, vihāsi purisuttamo
, dhammaṃ payirudāhāsi, ahari, hari, vihāsuṃ, āhiṃsu, vihiṃsu vā, ‘‘mā me tato mūlaphalaṃ āhaṃsū’’ti
pāḷi, ahāsuṃ, aharuṃ, haruṃ, ahariṃsu, hariṃsu, tvaṃ ahāsi, ahari, tumhe ahāsittha, aharittha, ahaṃ ahāsiṃ, ahariṃ, vihāsiṃ sāsane rato
. Hāhati vā, harissati, hāhinti, hāhanti, harissanti, hāhasi, sukhaṃ bhikkhu vihāhisi
Mahāvuttinā harassa dhātvantassa lopo ca, ‘‘yo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye appamatto vihassati
Mahāvuttinā dhātvantassa ccho pubbassa dvittañca, acchecchi taṇhaṃ, vivattayi saṃyojanaṃ
, ‘‘acchejjī’’tipi divādipāṭho dissati, acchecchuṃ vata bho rukkhaṃ
ssena saha dassa ccho, bhecchati, bhindissati, bhecchanti, bhindissanti, bhecchasi, bhecchatha, bhecchāmi, bhecchāma, bhindissāma, ‘‘taṃ te paññāya bhecchāmī’’ti
Ssatyādimhi-ssena saha cassa kkho, mokkhati, muñcissati, mokkhanti mārabandhanā
Yuja-yoge, yuñjati buddhasāsane, ārabhatīti attho, yuñjanti, pamādamanuyuñjanti, bālā dummedhino janā
Kārite-siñceti, siñcayati, siñcāpeti, siñcāpayati, siñceyya vā siñcāpeyya vā
. Sumbhanti, sumbhasi, sumbhatha, bhūmiṃ sumbhāmi vegasā
, uppajjantu, uppajjeyya, uppajjeyyuṃ, kinti nu kho saddhivihārikassa patto uppajjiyetha, cīvaraṃ uppajjiyetha, parikkhāro uppajjiyethāti
Cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi
Kupa-kope, paro parassa kuppati, kucchivāto kuppati, rogo kuppati, paṭikuppati, tejodhātu pakuppati
Dīpa-dittiyaṃ, dippati, dippanti, pure adhammo dippati
Samu-upasame nivāse ca, sammati, visammati, upasammati, vūpasammati, assame sammati, yattha sammati temiyo
Sivu-saṃsibbane, sibbati, sibbanti, sibbeyya vā sibbāpeyya vā
Disa-paññāyane, dissati, padissati, sandissati. Dissanti bālā abyattā
, ime dhammā mayi sandissanti, ahañca imesu dhammesu sandissāmi
Susa-sussane, sussati. Aṭṭhi ca nhāru ca cammañca avasissatu, upasussatu me sarīre maṃsalohitaṃ
Muha-muyhane, muyhati, sammuyhati, sammuyhāmi, pamuyhāmi. Sabbā muyhanti me disā
Īādimhi-dūtaṃ pahiṇi, pahiṇiṃsu, ‘kvaci vikaraṇāna’nti vikaraṇalopo, mahāvuttinā passa dīgho, dūtaṃ pāhesi
Nāyati. Viceyya viceyya atthe panāyatīti kho bhikkhave vipassīti vuccati
ñūādīsupi jaṃ hoti. ‘‘Pāpaṃ katvā mā maṃ jaññūti icchati
Karotu, saṅkharotu, kubbatu, krubbatu, kurutu, agghaṃ kurutu no bhavaṃ
So puññaṃ kayirā, puññaṃ ce puriso kayirā
So akāsi, te akaṃsu, gāthāyaṃ ‘‘akaṃsu satthuvacana’’nti
pāḷi. Akāsuṃ, tvaṃ akāsi. Mā tumhe evarūpaṃ akattha
, mākattha pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, āvī vā yadi vā raho
. Akāsittha, ahaṃ akāsiṃ, mayaṃ akāsimhā, akamhā. Bhogesu vijjamānesu, dīpaṃ nākamha attano
. So akā. ‘‘Tato ekasataṃ khatye, anuyante bhavaṃ akā’’ti
pāḷi. Akāsittha vā, ahaṃ akaṃ, akaraṃ vā. ‘‘Tassāhaṃ vacanaṃ nākaṃ, pitu vuddhassa bhāsita’’nti
‘‘Harassa cāhaṅa sse’ti ssena saha karassa rakārassa āhaṅa hoti, kāhati, kāhanti, kathaṃ kāhanti dārakā
Iñāgame-kāhiti, kāhinti iccādi. Kāhasi, kāhatha. Kāhāmi kusalaṃ bahuṃ
‘Āīādīsū’ti sutte yogavibhāgena ssatyādīsupi kā hoti, saṃyoge rassattaṃ, kassati, kassanti, kassasi, kassatha, kassāmi, kassāma, kassaṃ purisakāriyaṃ
Tāyati, tāyanti, patāyati, patāyanti. ‘‘Ito’dāni patāyanti, sūciyo balisāni cā’’ti

note.original: ka. 452; rū. 525; nī. 933; caṃ. 1.1.45; pā. 3.1.25; ‘curādito ṇi’ (bahūsu)

note.snippet: Āpubbo kathane āmantane ca. Āmantayāmi vo bhikkhave
, mantayi, āmantesi, āmantayi, nimantesi, nimantayi, mantesuṃ, mantayuṃ, mantayiṃsu rahogatā
Tikicchati, tikicchanti. Devāpi naṃ tikicchanti, mātāpettibharaṃ naraṃ
kiṃ? Badha-bandhana, hiṃsāsu, bādheti, bādhayati. Vātaṃ jālena bādhesi
Su-savane, sotuṃ icchatīti atthe – dvitte parassa dvittaṃ, sussusati
